general.label: GENERAL ALERTS
general.subLabel: Receive an email if these alerts are triggered

machineRelocation.label: Machine Relocated
machineRelocation.subLabel: Triggered if the machine reported a location that is outside the set radius of its home location. № Alert Radius(1 mile = 1.6 km)

noCharge.label: No Charge Alert
noCharge.subLabel: Triggered if the machine reported usage but the battery was not charged on that calendar day.

opportunityCharge.label: Opportunity Charge Alert
opportunityCharge.subLabel: Triggered if the machine reported its battery being plugged in for charging but not to completion.

chargerError.label: Charger Error
chargerError.subLabel: Triggered if a charger error is reported by the machine.

impactDetected.label: Impact Detected
impactDetected.subLabel: Triggered if an impact detected is reported by the machine.

noCommunication.label: No Communication
noCommunication.subLabel: Triggered if a machine has not communicated with the portal for the selected period.

maintenanceReminder.label: Maintenance Reminder
maintenanceReminder.subLabel: Triggered if a machine reaches a threshold of cleaning hours. *Only available for certain models. Please contact your sales rep for details.

others.label: OTHER ALERTS
others.subLabel: Only available for certain customers. Please contact your sales rep for details.

noServicePerformed.label: No Service Performed
noServicePerformed.subLabel: Triggered if a machine has not been serviced in the selected period.

serviceRequest.label: Service Request
serviceRequest.subLabel: Triggered if a Service Request has been created or completed.

ABWtankEmpty.label: ABW Tank Empty
ABWtankEmpty.subLabel: Triggered when Automatic Battery Watering (ABW) Tank needs to be filled with distilled water.

low_usage.label: LOW USAGE
low_usage.subLabel: Receive an email if a machine is used less than a chosen threshold

daily.label: Daily
daily.subLabel: Set value lower than what you consider low

weekly.label: Weekly
weekly.subLabel: Set value lower than what you consider low

monthly.label: Monthly
